name: MicroCure DTI 002
description: MicroCure DTI 002 (0.02% solids) is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating that is transparent, smooth and slippery. The smoothness and low surface energy of this coating makes it suitable for easy to clean (E2C) applications. MicroCure adherers well to most substrates including glass, metal, plastic and painted surfaces. MicroCure DTI is colorless and does not alter the color of most substrates.
